sentence.Network_en: Has she been qualified for criticism, her conscience must have restrained her from venturing at disapprobation.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使她有评论的水平, 她的良心也制止她冒然提出批评意见.

sentence.Network_en: He was interrupted in a speech by clamors of disapprobation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的演说因反对的叫嚣声而中断.

sentence.Network_en: You must know that though I grieved at their disapprobation, I could not hesitate.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要知道,即使她们的反对使我万分难受, 我还是不会犹豫的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: gre句子填空解题技巧之短语结构解法_天道留学 ... empathy: 移情，共鸣 disapprobation: 不以为然，非难 arcane: 神秘的，晦涩难解 …
disappointment 失望disapprobation 非难disarming 消除敌意
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disappointment 失望 disapprobation 不答应 disapprobatory 不答应的.
disappointment 令人失望disapprobation 不赞同disapproval 不许可

list.abs: ...disapprove）那快乐的事实（the very act of pleasing）：这又从属于“赞成和不赞成（approbation and disapprobation）”。康德举了这样的例子：“一个贫穷但却思想正派的人对爱他但却吝啬的父亲的那笔遗产所感到的高兴”；或者.
but company disapprobation , both sides does not fall for this conflict .但公司不答应，双方为此争执不下。

means.word_mean: 1. an expression of strong disapproval; pronouncing as wrong or morally culpable;

auth_sentence.content: So how can this project transcend so stern a disapprobation?
auth_sentence.res_content: So how can this project transcend so stern a disapprobation?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So how can this project transcend so stern a disapprobation?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,大概的;有希望的,可能的

dis不+approbation[n.称赞,认可]→n.不答应,非难,不赞成
